roleset.name: scatter like dots
roleset.note: CONSTELLATE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. No Vncls. Comparison to "dot". (from constellate.01-v)

roles.note: Agent not seen in internet search. (from constellate.01-v)

example.name: Theme as subject
example.text: The roses constellated the dark green of their tangled leaves.
example.arg: the dark green of their tangled leaves.

example.name: Passive
example.text: [The ancient mirrors]-1 were constellated *trace*-1 with bullet holes.

roleset.name: group into a constellation or cluster
roleset.note: CONSTELLATE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. Member of Vncls classify-29.10. Comparison to ?group?. (from constellate.02-v)

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Werthheimer discussed our innate tendency *PRO* to constellate, to see as "belonging together" elements that look alike.*

example.name: transitive
example.text: In quasi-ritual actions he constellated symbolic objects.

example.name: theme as subject with predicate
example.text: Pixels constellated as an image of printed text.
example.arg: as an image of printed text.

example.name: with destination
example.text: The ego is [the sum of our habits]-1 constellated *trace*-1 into a cohesive entity.
